top_comments.comment: I didn’t  see a single dude wearing Chelsea boots when I went out last weekend lol. Idk maybe it’s because I’m from dallas lol. We rock cowboy boots here . 🤠
White Air Force 1 are played out. Everyone has of shoes now.

comments_since_last_sample.body: Cheap Chelsea boot maybe out of style but not a nice JM Weston, Church’s, John Lobb, Testoni, Edward Green....Never take men’s shoes advice from Americans who love ugly shoes like Johnson and Murphy, Aldo, etc...

This video contradicts everything u have said in the past.the jeans looks bad bulky on the bottom make u look shorter.the boots I understand. But u loved chealse boots.the jacket for chubby people make the look even fatter

As a woman, I’m just here to say Chelsea boots and especially turtlenecks still look so good on a man. Don’t throw it out.

But the bombers have to go though lol.
The relaxed fit jeans he had on will never look good with boots.  They would swallow up the boot.  Too much material at the bottom!
